moves.1. e4: This is my standard opening.  Developing the pieces.
moves.2. Nf3: Bringing out my knight again as development and attacking e5.
moves.2... Qf6: Ok, I'm lost here.  I'm not an avid player but I have explored strategy and this move seems to go against most strategy I've read.  As of yet I see no value in it.
moves.3. d4: I can't see how his queen threatens me at this point so I continue development.
moves.5. Bd3: Blocking d4 and setting up the castle.
